TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EncryptedData extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType

remarks.para: This class is used to represent the <EncryptedData> element in XML encryption. This element is the core element in XML encryption. Its child element, <CipherData>, contains encrypted data. The <EncryptedData> element replaces an encrypted element or serves as the new document root.

summary.para: Represents the <EncryptedData> element in XML encryption. This class cannot be inherited.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

remarks.para: This constructor creates a new instance of the class. For more information about XML encryption standards, see the "XML Encryption Syntax and Processing" document at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Xml.XmlElement GetXml() cil managed

remarks.para: Use this method to output the <EncryptedData> element.

summary.para: Returns the XML representation of the object.

returns.para: An that represents the <EncryptedData> element in XML encryption.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void LoadXml(class System.Xml.XmlElement value) cil managed

remarks.para: Use this method to load an existing XML element into the <EncryptedData> element represented by the object.

summary.para: Loads XML information into the <EncryptedData> element in XML encryption.

Docs.param: An object representing an XML element to use for the <EncryptedData> element.
